questionListItems.title: How can I get more information about the CDC Vouchers Scheme?

answer.body: Please visit the CDC website https://vouchers.cdc.gov.sg

questionListItems.title: How can I check my application status after I have submitted my interest to participate?

answer.body:
If you have submitted your application and have not received a reply after 14 calendar days from the date of submission, please contact your respective CDCs to check on the status of your application. We seek your patience as our Ambassadors are reaching out to a large number of merchants progressively in the next few months.


  • Central Singapore CDC - pa_centralsingapore@pa.gov.sg

  • North East CDC - northeast_cdc@pa.gov.sg

  • North West CDC - northwest_cdc@pa.gov.sg

  • South East CDC - southeast_cdc@pa.gov.sg

  • South West CDC - southwest_cdc@pa.gov.sg

questionListItems.title: How do I get my shop code?

answer.body: You will receive your shop code from the CDC Ambassador during your onboarding session. It will also be sent to you via SMS to your registered mobile number.

questionListItems.title: I would like to sign up for a PAssion card. Can I sign up via the app?

answer.body:
If you would like to sign up for the PAssion EZ-Link Card/e-Membership today, you can do it via MyPAssion App. Users are required to log in via Singpass to sign up for the card.


PAssion e-Membership sign-up is applicable for members of the public aged 15 and above and above with a valid Singpass. Alternatively, you can visit any Community Club/Centre to sign up for the PAssion EZ-Link Card. The card will be mailed to you in about 2-3 weeks' time.


For more information on the PAssion Card programme, please log on to https://www.onepa.gov.sg/passion-card. You may also access the full set of FAQs via https://www.onepa.gov.sg/passion-card/passion-card-membership/passion-card-faqs


[NOTE: Direct Card Printing service will cease by Feb 24]

questionListItems.title: How much is the PAssion card membership?

answer.body:
The 5-year PAssion Card membership fees are:

  • $12.00 for a Principal Card (for ages between 18 and 59 years old);

  • $10.00 for a Principal Card (for ages below 18 years old, and 60 years old and above)

The above fees are membership fees only and do not include any ez-link stored value. The PAssion Card is an adult ez-link card and cannot be used for concessionary fares for public transport by Senior Citizens, NSmen, Students and Children.


** To encourage more families to participate in CC courses and activities, PA has a scheme to encourage participation where children below 18 can be tagged as Supplementary Members to their parent's Principal Card at no additional cost. However, these children will have no cards issued to them.

questionListItems.title: Who is eligible to apply PAssion card membership?

answer.body: There is no nationality or age limit for this card application, all are welcome.

questionListItems.title: Are supplementary memberships for children only? Is there a membership fee to include supplementary members?

answer.body: As a Principal PAssion Cardholder, parents have the option of adding their children who are below 18 years of age as supplementary members to their PAssion Card membership at no cost. NO card will be issued to the supplementary member. With the supplementary membership, the child will enjoy discounts for courses/activities at CCs/PA outlets.

questionListItems.title: Is there a limit to the number of children who can be added as supplementary members?

answer.body: No, there is no limit to the number of children who can be tagged to the Principal Cardholder. However, the supplementary member(s) must be the child/ children of the Principal Cardholder with whom they are tagged to and they must be below 18 years old at the point of registration.

questionListItems.title: Can I sign up for the PAssion card online?

answer.body: You can sign up via onePA website at www.onepa.gov.sg. However, Singpass login is required. If you don't have Singpass, please proceed to your nearest CC to assist with your membership application instead.

questionListItems.title: What is the cost for card replacement?

answer.body: You will be charged a fee of $7.50 (inclusive of GST) or such other sum as may be determined by PA from time to time for a replacement card in the event that you lost or damage your card.

questionListItems.title: How is the refund being done through ez-recover when I lost my PAssion card?

answer.body:
Step 1:

Provide us your Name, NRIC/FIN/Passport No, Date of Birth, Contact and Address for verification and PA will liaise with EZ-Link Pte Ltd to de-activate your card from misuse.(Note: De-activation is permanent and card cannot be reinstated for security purposes. It will take up to 48 hours from the time of reporting the lost card for the ez-link function to be blocked by EZ-Link Pte Ltd)


Step 2: Go to the nearest Community Club (CC) for us to assist you with a replacement card at $7.50


Step 3: Complete the 'EZ-recover application for PAssion EZ-Link Card' form available at the CC office if there is stored value* remaining in your card. (*EZ-Link Pte Ltd will process the refund within 28 working days upon the submission of the completed application form to CC office.)


Step 4: Email National Library Board (NLB) at enquiry@nlb.gov.sg to report loss of PAssion Card if you are a registered NLB user. Alternatively, you can drop by your nearest CC to report the loss of your PAssion Card and to file for any refund (at best efforts by EZ-Link Pte Ltd).

Click here to locate CC.

The recovery is done on best effort basis and processing will take up to 28 working days from date of submission of completed forms and documentation.


[TEMPORARILY UNAVAILABLE] For refund option to transfer the recovered monies to another Card, you will receive a notification letter to proceed with the transfer of refund to the new Card within 3 months, failing which you will have no further claim to the refund monies.


For enquiries, please call PA Contact Centre at 6225 5322 (8am to 6pm, Mondays to Sundays, excluding Public Holidays).

questionListItems.title: What are the benefits of the NLB partner membership?

answer.body: NLB Partner Membership entitles PAssion Cardholders to borrow up to 24 library items. You can borrow audio books and more. (Types of Membership)

questionListItems.title: Do I need to pay for the NLB partner membership? How do I sign up for the NLB partner membership?

answer.body:
NLB partner membership is free of charge for all Singaporean/Singapore PR PAssion Members. To PAssion Members are eligible to upgrade their your existing library membership after a valid please login here. For PAssion Members who are non-library members, you may login with your Singpass at the NLB membership registration page to register for the NLB Partner membership.


You can also register by LifeSG.

questionListItems.title: My children are PAssion card supplementary members. How can they enjoy NLB partner membership?

answer.body: A physical card is required to borrow items from NLB. As no physical card is issued to supplementary PAssion members you may wish to consider applying for a PAssion Card at $10.
Yes. YUU Points stay valid for 2 years from the date of points awarded.
